data.name: Ganbaru
data.detailed_description:
Ganbaru is a fast-paced 2D precision platformer with a focus on precision and fluidity, with a strong japanese aesthetic and soundtrack.

Ganbaru has a classic purity that’s all about getting from the beginning to the end, navigating familiar but challenging hazards like spikes, spikes, some spikes, and also, some spikes. They rotate, they spin, they shoot out at you, and sometimes, they just sit there.

Along the way, you’ll master wall-jumping, double-jumping, bouncing, springs, vanishing platforms, moving platforms and even portals as you leap from level to geometric level, moving along, up and down the screen to put in your best possible performance over 60 challenging and varied stages.

data.short_description: You hit a wall in your training. You heard a rumor of a Master living high in the mountains... Ganbaru is a fast-paced 2D precision platformer with a focus on precision and fluidity, with a strong japanese aesthetic and soundtrack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: Some
  • Additional Notes: Its not graphically heavy!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 12
  • Processor: Intel i9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3090
  • Sound Card: Yes!
  • Additional Notes: This is a joke! :)
